string.value: Let's begin the exploration! You can earn the #b<Beginner Explorer>#k title by exploring the villages in Victoria.
#b#eTitle - Beginner Explorer#k#n\r\nExplore the 20 main regions of Victoria Island.\r\n#bâ— Status : #R27010# / 20 Completed#k
You have earned the #b<Beginner Explorer>#k title for exploring various places in Victoria Island, where all adventures begin.
You've finished exploring the outskirts of Victoria Island. I will now grant you the #b<Beginner Explorer>#k title.

How did you enjoy exploring Victoria Island? It's easy to take for granted what's always been there for you since Day 1 of your journey. Now that you've acquired the title of #b<Beginner Explorer>#k I hope you've been reminded of how important and meaningful Victoria Island has been to you. I look forward to your active participation as a passionate explorer. Oh, and keep up the good work as you explore other parts of Maple World!
Come back and see me after you've explored every inch of Victoria Island.
